meanings.definition: To smile in a smug or self-satisfied way.
meanings.sent1: She smerked after winning the game.
meanings.sent2: He smerked when he realized he had outsmarted his friends.
meanings.sent3: The cat smerked as it knocked the vase off the table.
meanings.sent4: The villain smerked as his evil plan unfolded perfectly.
meanings.sent5: Her smerked expression showed her confidence in her answer.

meanings.definition: To laugh in a sly or mocking manner.
meanings.sent1: The bully smerked at the smaller kids.
meanings.sent2: She smerked at his cheesy joke, finding it amusing.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child smerked as he played a prank on his sister.
meanings.sent4: The comedian smerked at his own clever punchline.
meanings.sent5: His smerked laughter echoed through the room, causing others to chuckle.
